alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Licking; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN, FAIRFIELD, HOCKING, EASTERN PICKAWAY, LICKING AND EASTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Summit Station to 10 miles east of Chillicothe, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph, penny size hail, and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Newark, Lancaster, Reynoldsburg, Gahanna, Pickerington, Heath, Logan, Granville, Pataskala, Canal Winchester, Baltimore, Buckeye Lake, Hebron, Utica, Bremen, Millersport, Pleasantville, Hanover and Hide-A-Way Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Licking; Pickaway; Ross
